md2html

md2html is a tool to conver markdown file into html file. Besides markdown conversion, md2html also support embedded latx formula conversion.

Install

$ npm install md2html -g

Usage


  Usage: md2html [options] <markdown-file ...>


  Options:

    -V, --version         output the version number
    -w, --with-html-head  wrap generated html file with html tag.
    -h, --help            output usage information
